text: Biophysics is a science where the laws of physics are used to study biology, the science on life and living things. Unlike biochemistry and molecular biology, sciences where macromolecules or "large" groups of molecules are studied, biophysicists study single or small groups of molecules. == Related pages == *Bionics *Computational biology *Database of Molecular Motions *Nanotechnology Category:Branches of biology Category:Subfields of physics Category:Biophysics
title: Biophysics
